full_description:
Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13400 Budget Desktop PC

The Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13400 Budget Desktop PC is a powerful device that may provide outstanding performance without breaking the budget. With cutting-edge technology to easily manage your processing demands, the powerful Intel 13th Gen Core i5 13400 Raptor Lake Processor is at its core. This system's solid base is provided by the MSI PRO B760M-E DDR5 m-ATX Motherboard, which offers dependability and expansion capacity for further upgrades. When used in tandem with the Corsair Vengeance 16GB DDR5 DRAM, which has an amazing 5600MHz clock speed, multitasking is effortless and ensures stable performance even with high workloads. Thanks to the Team MP44 512GB M.2 PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD, which offers plenty of capacity for your files and quick data access, storage is blazingly quick. The DeepCool AG400 PLUS CPU Cooler regulates temperatures, guaranteeing peak performance even during prolonged gaming sessions or demanding work. The Antec META V450 450W Power Supply powers this setup, providing steady, effective power to every part while keeping a silent operation. The Gamdias AURA GC2 Mesh ARGB Mid-tower ATX Gaming Casing makes your rig stand out with its configurable RGB lights and enough ventilation to keep temps down.
